---
title: "How to cite this"
---

The main purpose of this blog is to be used, be it in a term paper assignment or a BA thesis. 

However, I do ask that you give proper attribution to whatever content you use by citing it appropriately in your text.

**You can find suggested citations at the very bottom of each post.**

To cite the entire blog, please use:

> Knotz, Carlo. 2026. *Testing big ideas with simple methods*. [cknotz.github.io/getstuffdone_blog/](cknotz.github.io/getstuffdone_blog/)
